title: The obedie[n]ce of a Christen man and how Christe[n] rulers ought to governe, where in also (if thou marke diligently) thou shalt fynde eyes to perceave the crafty conveyance of all iugglers.
author: Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
publicationStmtPlace: [At Marlborow in the la[n]de of Hesse [i.e. Antwerp] :
publicationStmtPublisher: the seconde daye of October. Anno. M.CCCCC.xxviii, by me Hans luft [i.e. J. Hoochstraten],
